code: import axios from"axios";var BASE_URL="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/";var API_KEY="16dd81a9c48e022ac37ab1a286d37f0a";export var getTrendingMovies=function getTrendingMovies(){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"trending/movie/day?api_key=").concat(API_KEY));};export var fetchMovieWithId=function fetchMovieWithId(id){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"movie/").concat(id,"?api_key=").concat(API_KEY));};export var getMoviesQuery=function getMoviesQuery(query){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"search/movie?api_key=").concat(API_KEY,"&query=").concat(query));};export var getMoviesCredits=function getMoviesCredits(id){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"movie/").concat(id,"/credits?api_key=").concat(API_KEY));};export var getMoviesReviews=function getMoviesReviews(id){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"movie/").concat(id,"/reviews?api_key=").concat(API_KEY));};
